PrintOrder.title: Order Printed Copy
PrintOrder.signInOrCreateAccount: You need to sign in or create an account to place a print order.

errors.storyNotPublished: Only published stories can be printed

addressInfo.selectShipping: Please select a shipping address for your printed book.
addressInfo.noAddresses: You don't have any saved addresses. Please add a shipping address to continue.

payment.chooseQuality: Choose the printing quality that suits you best:
payment.softcoverDescription: Flexible paperback with a glossy finish. Ideal for daily reading and handling.
payment.hardcoverDescription: Rigid cover, sturdy binding. Perfect as a gift or to keep for a long time.
payment.premiumDescription: Deluxe hardcover edition with premium materials. Exceptional quality for special occasions.
payment.priceNote: All prices include 4 chapter printing in full-color printing and delivery.
payment.needMoreCredits: You need {count} more credits to place this order.
payment.creditsInfo: Payment will be deducted from your credits balance when you place the order.
payment.pleaseSelectOption: Please select a printing option to continue.
payment.confirmOrderDescription: Due to high demand, the delivery can take up to 4 weeks. Are you sure you want to proceed with your order?

confirmation.title: Order Placed Successfully!
confirmation.message: Your print request has been submitted. You will receive updates on the printing and shipping status via email.
